IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE AND MAINTAIN 20 AFFORDABLE APARTMENT HOMES FOR THE ELDERLY IN MEADVILLE, PA.
IRS990.MissionDesc: PROVIDE ATTRACTIVE AND AFFORDABLE RENTAL HOUSING TO VERY-LOW AND LOW INCOME ELDERLY INDIVIDUALS IN MEADVILLE PA.
IRS990.Desc: BROOKSIDE APARTMENTS, INC., THROUGH ITS MANAGEMENT AGENT HOUSING AND NEIGHBORHOOD DEVELOPMENT SERVICE (HANDS) PROVIDES 20 ATTRACTIVE AND AFFORDABLE RENTAL HOUSING UNITS TO VERY-LOW, AND LOW INCOME ELDERLY INDIVIDUALS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: A RESIDENT SERVICE COORDINATOR LINKS RESIDENTS TO EXISTING SERVICES AND RESOURCES IN THE COMMUNITY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SECURITY DEPOSITS HELD ON BEHALF OF RESIDENTS.

THE PROJECT IS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAX UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. INEREST AND PENALTIES RELATED TO TAX REPORTING ARE RECOGNIZED WHEN INCURRED AND ARE INCLUDED AS ADMINISTRATIVE EXPENSES IN THE STATEMENTS OF ACTIVITIES. THERE WERE NO INTEREST OR PENALTIES INCURRED RELATED TO TAX REPORTING FOR THE YEARS ENDED SEPTEMBER 30, 2018 AND 2017. THE PROJECT'S TAX RETURNS ARE SUBJECT TO AUDIT BY VARIOUS TAXING AUTHORITIES. THE OPEN AUDIT PERIODS FOR THE PROJECT ARE THE FISCAL YEARS ENDING IN 2015, 2016, 2017, AND 2018. THE PROJECT FOLLOWS THE TOPIC OF INCOME TAXES FROM THE FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING STANDARDS BOARD, ACCOUNTING STANDARDS CODIFICATION, (FASB ASC) WITH REGARD TO THE ACCOUNTING AND RECOGNITION OF INCOME TAX POSITONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN THE PROJECT'S TAX RETURN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 3
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MANAGEMENT DUTIES ARE PERFORMED BY HOUSING AND NEIGHBORHOOD DEVELOPMENT SERVICE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCE COMMITTEE HOLDS REGULAR MEETINGS AND HAS AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE GOVERNING BODY, BUT DOES NOT KEEP MINUTES DOCUMENTING THOSE MEETINGS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NO REVIEW WAS OR WILL BE CONDUCTED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
THE ORGANIZATION HAS NOT CHANGED EITHER ITS OVERSIGHT PROCESS OR SELECTION PROCESS DURING THE TAX YEAR.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: DEVELOPMENT AND MANAGEMENT OF AFFORDABLE HOUSING COMMUNITIES.
